## kl vpn intercept start

start intercept app to tunnel trafic to your device

### Synopsis

```
start intercept app to tunnel trafic to your device
Examples:
	# intercept app with selected vpn device
  kl vpn intercept start --app <app_name>
	
```

### Options

```
  -a, --app string   app name
  -h, --help         help for start
  -h, --help   help for start
```
